progetto.network

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.Player

  • public final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A Player is a object holding the in room info about a player. It's up to the network to keep this information right. New players info must be build from a room, so that a right id can be provided. Player name is unique inside a room, player id is unique inside a server.
    Author:
    Massimo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String playerName,
              ServerConnection handler)
        builds a playerInfo from a name and a server connection
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name with which this player will be known
        handler - the sever connection that allow to send message to the client

    • Method Detail

      • peekRequest

        IRoomRequest peekRequest()
        Returns:
        the oldest pending request made from the player, without popping in

      • popRequest

        IRoomRequest popRequest()
        Returns:
        the oldest pending request, and removes it from the queue

      • getHandler

        public ServerConnection getHandler()
        Returns:
        the server connection that is being currently used by this Player

      • getChairID

        public int getChairID()
        Returns:
        the current chair of a player. Default chair is -1 that stands for observers.

      • setChairID

        void setChairID(int id)
        Force set the chair of this player, cannot be used directly, this must be done throught the player room so that it can be checked if the room already has a player in that chair. Triggers chairChangedEvent event if the new chair is equal to the old one. The old value will be passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        id -

      • setReady

        void setReady(boolean ready)
        Set the new ready value of this player. Triggers readyStateChangedEvent even if the new value is equal to the old one. The old value will be passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        ready - new ready value.

      • getPlayerID

        public int getPlayerID()
        Returns:
        the id of this player. Player ids are unique inside a server.

      • getView

        public PlayerView getView()
        Returns:
        the view representing the current state of this room

      • updateSnapshot

        private void updateSnapshot()
        call this function every time a modification of this object happens, this will update the snapshot state of this player. This will ensure that as long as the updates are made in thread safe environement the view can be recovered from any thread.
